##### Student Helpdesk

e-Mail: digitalcare@utm.my

![](https://elearning.utm.my/24252/pluginfile.php/1/theme_moove/marketing3icon/1742876588/lecturer%20helpdesk%20%281%29.png)

##### Lecturer Helpdesk

Tel: 07-5537915 / 37914/ 37916  
e-Mail: elearning@utm.my

![](https://elearning.utm.my/24252/pluginfile.php/1/theme_moove/marketing4icon/1742876588/email.png)

##### Email

 elearning@utm.my

*   *    Select activity  UTM General Online Examination Rules...
        
        ####  **UTM General Online Examination Rules**
        
        ******All students have to read the following online exam rules and regulations. Please read them here: [https://forms.gle/EvJSfFSenWFMMFsA8](https://forms.gle/EvJSfFSenWFMMFsA8)
        ****  
        **
        
        ![](https://elearning.utm.my/24252/pluginfile.php/17845/mod_label/intro/image.png)
        
    *    Select activity Text and media area
        
        ![](https://elearning.utm.my/24252/pluginfile.php/17846/mod_label/intro/backup.jpg)  
        
    *    Select activity PERMOHONAN MENJALANKAN UJIAN DALAM TALIAN
        
        **Application for Conducting Online Examinations Using UTM E-Learning System**:
        
         To all lecturers planning to conduct online exams and quizzes via e-learning, kindly notify us via email to e-learning ([elearning@utm.my](mailto:elearning@utm.my)
        ) and cc UTMDigital ([digitalcare@utm.my](mailto:digitalcare@utm.my)
        ) **three days before the exam date**. This is to ensure that staff members are available to assist with any technical issues during the exam.
        
         Important information for all lecturers:
        
        *   Monitoring hours are limited to working hours on Monday to Friday (8:00 AM to 5:00 PM).
        *   Monitoring services are not available outside office hours.
        *   The maximum number of students that can be accommodated simultaneously in the UTM E-Learning system is 250. If the number exceeds 250, the system may not function optimally.
        
        We sincerely appreciate your cooperation. For further inquiries, please contact [elearning@utm.my](mailto:elearning@utm.my)
         and [digitalcare@utm.my](mailto:digitalcare@utm.my)
        .
        
        **  
        Application for Proctoring Exams in the UTM E-Learning System**:
        
        To all lecturers planning to use e-proctoring services for online exams via e-learning, please submit your application through the following Google Form for record purposes:  [https://forms.gle/K2BFFM7yzdwcPcxt5](https://forms.gle/K2BFFM7yzdwcPcxt5)
        
    *    Select activity eLearning Archives
